abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Brazil", "OccurrenceStatus is Present", "TaxonKey is Calliandra Benth." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from MPM Milwaukee Public Museum Herbarium 1 records from Dados da ocorrência de plantas lenhosas em uma cronossequência em área de Caatinga, Parque Nacional do Catimbau, Buíque, PE, Brasil 1 records from University of Florida Herbarium (FLAS) 1 records from Botany (UPS) 1 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 1 records from Levantamento do estrato arbustivo da vegetação de campina do RDS Uatumã 1 records from University of British Columbia Herbarium (UBC) - Vascular Plant Collection 1 records from HAMAB - Herbário Amapaense 1 records from Rapid Assessment Program (RAP) Biodiversity Survey Database 1 records from Manchester Museum, University of Manchester, Botany Collection 1 records from Taxon occurrence data for the FungalRoot database 2 records from Herbarium (UNA) 2 records from HUCPE - Herbário da Universidade Católica de Pernambuco 2 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 2 records from HUEG - Herbário da Universidade Estadual de Goiás 2 records from DAV - UC Davis Herbarium 2 records from University of Michigan Herbarium 2 records from MFS-Flores - Herbário Profª. Drª.
